scripts.clean: rm -rf ./build ./readworks-ce && cd backend && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.make: npm run install && npm run build && cp -R ./backend/dist ./build
scripts.make:clean: npm run clean && npm run make
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run clean:soft && npm run build
scripts.compile:windows: rm -rf ./readworks-ce && npm run resolve && npm run collect:licensedata && cd build && npm run dist && mv ./dist ../readworks-ce
scripts.compile:mac: export TARGET_ARCH=arm64 && export CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && npm run make:clean && rm -rf ./readworks-ce && npm run resolve && npm run collect:licensedata && cd build && npm run dist && mv ./dist ../readworks-ce
scripts.compile:mac:intel: export TARGET_ARCH=x64 && export CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && npm run make:clean && rm -rf ./readworks-ce && npm run resolve && npm run collect:licensedata && cd build && npm run dist && mv ./dist ../readworks-ce
